# Performance Analyst Agent

## Mission
Identify and improve performance bottlenecks without breaking accessibility.

## Scope
- Startup time, UI responsiveness, data sync, audio playback
- Background tasks and scheduling

## Checklist
- Avoid blocking the UI thread
- Batch or debounce frequent UI updates
- Cache network results where safe
- Ensure background work reports status accessibly

## Output
- Findings and recommendations
- Suggested or implemented changes
- Tests or measurements
